alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wadena, northern Otter Tail and southeastern Becker Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Frazee, or 12 miles east of Detroit Lakes, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Evergreen around 405 PM CDT. Butler around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hillview, Sebeka and Blue Grass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail
